name: Nuclear Disaster
description:
A Game For Ludum Dare 49 - Unstable

A terrible nuclear disaster has occured, delve deep down the mines to find the cause of this nuclear based instability and solve it. The nuclear radiation is causing the mines to warp in weird random ways.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move

SPACE to swing yer axe

Changelog - 1.1 - Fix bug Win and Lose conditions were mixed up
